titles.title: Wildfire Prevention Act of 2015
To authorize the Federal Emergency Management Agency to award mitigation financial assistance in certain areas affected by wildfires.

bill.summary:
2/13/2015--Introduced. Wildfire Prevention Act of 2015
Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to authorize the President to provide: (1) hazard mitigation assistance in any area affected by a fire for which t assistance was provided, whether or not a major disaster had been declared; and (2) fire management assistance in any area affected by a fire for which hazard mitigation assistance was provided.
